goal.en: This is an English-only class and a four-semester course for two years. The first-year class aims to give students practical experience on an experimental basis. They are expected to learn the basic methodology of Physics experiments and develop a scientific attitude, effective oral and written communication skills, and collaborative learning skills by working in a group.
goal.ch: This is an English-only class and a four-semester course for two years. The first-year class aims to give students practical experience on an experimental basis. They are expected to learn the basic methodology of Physics experiments and develop a scientific attitude, effective oral and written communication skills, and collaborative learning skills by working in a group.

content.en:
- Introduction to basic experiment and error analysis
- Electrical circuit of RC, RLC circuits, and simple ICs
- Digital Circuits
- Basic machine shop work
- Measurement tools such as oscilloscope, Arduino, DAQ, and FPGA board
- Computer simulation (Python or Matlab)
- Microscopy
- etc.
2 hours of classroom lecture + on-stage presentation by student per week
